name: Giver: Endless Slide
description:
Endless Slide is a fun, playground-inspired take on the "Endless Run" genre. It's (literally) non-stop fun as you tap the screen to dodge side-to-side.

You're zooming down an infinite tube, sliding past crazy obstacles and trying to collect popsicles (points), juice boxes (shields) and hearts (health). Default mode has 4 levels, all with a satisfying end point. But in true endless mode, the slide never stops! By playing the 4 levels for long enough in endless mode, you can unlock 2 bonus levels that open up even more ceaseless fun.

Slide on!
